level.heading: Adoption of revised articles of incorporation.

level.text: Adoption of the revised articles of incorporation of the converted stock company is necessary to implement the plan and shall be governed by the applicable provisions of District law.
For a Class 1 mutual company, the members may adopt the revised articles of incorporation at the same meeting at which the members approve the plan.
For a Class 2 or 3 mutual company, the revised articles of incorporation may be adopted solely by the board of directors or trustees, as provided by District law.

level.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 2(a) of the Insurance Demutualization Temporary Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Law 12-221, April 13, 1999, law notification 46 DCR 3843).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary amendment of section, see § 2(a) of the Insurance Demutualization Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-528, December 16, 1998, 45 DCR 476).
